column4: I upgraded to Feisty from Dapper (from and ISO). In Dapper I could have 4 "window selectors" (ie, work space windows) in the lower right hand corner of the work space. Feisty seems to limit this to 2 "window selector." How do I get 4 in Feisty?
Can't you right click on the tool bar, and edit it's properties?
